events.text: This thing sure is big, huh? Fufufu...
Hi, I'm just a wandering bard. You can call me...
...Kanna! I also take pictures for the Guild as a side-hobby.
Kanna... I'm Ariko. Umm... Do you know what this thing is?
Ah, no. I was just walking around taking in the scenery when this giant tower popped up out of nowhere!
Sure gave me a spook! Eheh.
Anyways, what are you doing here? It's pretty far out from the city.
I live here. Like, right here.
Oh, really! Jeez, I can't imagine having a giant building just pop up out of nowhere on top of your house like that.
Oh, I know! Wanna take a picture here with this tower?
You're the first person here, and this is your home after all.
Once the Guild gets here, I doubt you're gonna be able to return...
